changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE application.contact ( id UUID NOT NULL DEFAULT uuid_generate_v4() PRIMARY KEY, customer_id UUID NOT NULL, number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, contact_type_id UUID NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES application.customer (id), FOREIGN KEY (contact_type_id) REFERENCES dictionaries.contact_type (id) );
